                           Release Notes
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Comments :
Colonel Terry Childers is a 30-year Marine veteran: a decorated officer with 
combat experience in Vietnam, Beirut and Desert Storm. But now, the country 
he served so well has put him on trial for a rescue mission that went terribly 
wrong. For his attorney, he has chosen Marine Colonel Hayes Hodges, a 
comrade-in-arms who owes his life to Childers. Hodges is not the best lawyer 
in the service, but Childers trusts him as a brother Marine who knows what 
it's like to risk death under fire. Bound by duty and friendship, Hodges 
reluctantly takes the case, even as he begins to doubt the man who saved his 
life in Vietnam three decades ago.


Director : William Friedkin

 
Writers: James Webb (story)
         Stephen Gaghan (screenplay)
